topic_metadata.title: How to organize Projects in the web app?

posts.cooked:
I use the Typst web app to write my homework several times every week. I’ve been doing that for a while, but now there are just too many projects.
Are there any features for organizing implemented in the web app such as labels, tags or folders?
posts.raw:
I use the Typst web app to write my homework several times every week. I've been doing that for a while, but now there are just too many projects.
Are there any features for organizing implemented in the web app such as labels, tags or folders?

posts.name: Pascal Quach
posts.cooked:
Hello @Derivat,
I think there has been discourse off the forum. I think @laurmaedje would be the most knowledgeable to give an answer on the progress
posts.raw:
Hello @Derivat,
I think there has been discourse off the forum. I think @laurmaedje would be the most knowledgeable to give an answer on the progress

posts.name: Laurenz Mädje
posts.cooked: There are no project folders yet, but we have plans to add that feature.
posts.raw: There are no project folders yet, but we have plans to add that feature.
